overview: The quiet and simple life of Claudio (Mike Foster) is sent into disarray when he falls in love with Candy, the most beautiful woman he has ever seen. Candy (Brigitta Bui) soon becomes an obsession for him. An insane and perverted infatuation, driving him to follow her while she sells her body for the highest price. Is it still possible to find love with a person whose goal in life is to have sex for money?
title: The Double Life of Candy
